hooks.command: node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{const i=JSON.parse(d);const out=i.tool_output?.output||'';if(/console\.log/.test(out)){console.error('[Hook] Warning: console.log detected in output. Consider removing before commit.');}}catch{}console.log(d)})"

Stop.description: Warn about console.log after each response
